name: World Invasion
description:
-Choose from 15 countries- USA, UK, China, India, Russia, Japan,Brazil,Engliand,Indonesia,Malaysia,Canada,Mexico,Korea,Vietnam,Israel,
-Send SOS and ask your ally for help
-Attack and raid your enemy
-Show your army for all.
-Massively Multiplayer Online Role Playing Game.
-Live updates with new missions, units, buildings and more
-Donate to your allies and help each other.
-Ally with other players to make you stronger.
-Join a battlion with our friends and help each other out
-Experience gorgeous graphics
-FREE real time updates
-Broadcast Messages to your Alliance.
-Battle others in multiplayers online gameplay.
